infovis.panel.color
Class ColorScheme

java.lang.Object
  infovis.panel.color.ColorScheme
All Implemented Interfaces:
Icon
public class ColorScheme
extends Object
implements Icon

Manage Color ramps by name and load/save them from resource files.

Version:
$Revision: 1.4 $
Author:
Jean-Daniel Fekete

Parameters:

Returns:

parseColorRamp

public static Color[] parseColorRamp(String spec)
Parses a color ramp from a string and returns a table of colors.

Parameters:
spec - the string specifying a list of colors as a space separated list or r,g,b triples
Returns:
a table of colors
